controller.craft

Class CraftWindowControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.craft.CraftWindowControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CraftWindowController

    public final class CraftWindowControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CraftWindowController
    An implementation for the CraftWindowController interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CraftWindowControllerImpl(Controller owner, CraftWindow view)
      Instantiates a new craft window controller with the given controller and view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearGrid()
      Clears the CraftWindow grid.
      void insert(Grid grid, Type type, Position position)
      The element is inserted in the given position of the given the CraftWindow grid, but only if the latter is empty or contains an element of a different type.
      void loadLevel(java.lang.String path)
      Loads a level from the file-system and updates the model and the view subsequently.
      void saveLevel(java.lang.String name, Grid grid, java.lang.String path)
      Creates a level with the given name and grid, validates it and saves it using the given absolute path in the file-system.

      • clearGrid

        public void clearGrid()
        Description copied from interface: CraftWindowController
        Clears the CraftWindow grid.
        Specified by:
        clearGrid in interface CraftWindowController

      • insert

        public void insert(Grid grid,
                   Type type,
                   Position position)
        Description copied from interface: CraftWindowController
        The element is inserted in the given position of the given the CraftWindow grid, but only if the latter is empty or contains an element of a different type. If the position already contains the given type, the position is cleared.
        Specified by:
        insert in interface CraftWindowController
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid in which to insert
        type - the type to be inserted
        position - the position in which to insert

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel(java.lang.String path)
               throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                      LevelNotValidException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: CraftWindowController
        Loads a level from the file-system and updates the model and the view subsequently.
        Specified by:
        loadLevel in interface CraftWindowController
        Parameters:
        path - the absolute path of the level on the file-system
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the loaded object is not valid (e.g. level is corrupted)
        LevelNotValidException - if the level is not valid
        java.io.IOException - if an input/output error occurs

      • saveLevel

        public void saveLevel(java.lang.String name,
                      Grid grid,
                      java.lang.String path)
               throws LevelNotValidException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: CraftWindowController
        Creates a level with the given name and grid, validates it and saves it using the given absolute path in the file-system.
        Specified by:
        saveLevel in interface CraftWindowController
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the level
        grid - the grid of the level
        path - the absolute path to which save the level in the file-system
        Throws:
        LevelNotValidException - if the level is not valid
        java.io.IOException - if an input/output error occurs
